body:
@alykhantejani got one sporadic test failure with this. what do you suggest i do?

```
00:06:59.488 ======================================================================
00:06:59.488 FAIL: test_orthogonal (__main__.TestNNInit)
00:06:59.488 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00:06:59.488 Traceback (most recent call last):
00:06:59.488   File "/home/jenkins/buildbot/workspace/pytorch-master-py3-linux/builder/pytorch/test/common.py", line 67, in wrapper
00:06:59.488     fn(*args, **kwargs)
00:06:59.488   File "test_nn.py", line 3385, in test_orthogonal
00:06:59.488     torch.eye(rows) * gain ** 2, prec=1e-6)
00:06:59.488   File "/home/jenkins/buildbot/workspace/pytorch-master-py3-linux/builder/pytorch/test/common.py", line 214, in assertEqual
00:06:59.488     assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
00:06:59.488   File "/home/jenkins/buildbot/workspace/pytorch-master-py3-linux/builder/pytorch/test/common.py", line 206, in assertTensorsEqual
00:06:59.488     self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
00:06:59.488 AssertionError: 0.02971698865997361 not less than or equal to 1e-06 : 
00:06:59.488 
00:06:59.488 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
```
